title: Nasreddin1205
author: Nasreddin1205
content: If you're wondering, the Oasis Network, has a layer that kinda acts like rollups, allowing separate computing environment. They're seeking to add Move to their ParaTimes it seems. Move if you're out of the loop was the smart contract system built on Rust that Meta's abandoned Diem was gonna use. https://medium.com/oasis-protocol-project/oasis-seeks-builders-to-develop-a-move-paratime-909d307431e9TL;DR medium describes the utility of Move and how it uses linear logic to create a flexible and secure environment, and how the modular design of Oasis Network can easily implement it in its ParaTime layer should there be enough interest.

comments.author: SherhanCrypto
comments.body: It would be interesting to look at the implementation of MOVE ParaTime on Oasis. I think this ParaTime would be the best in terms of privacy and security.

comments.author: Nasreddin1205
comments.body: Quote from: SherhanCrypto on October 18, 2022, 09:24:11 AMIt would be interesting to look at the implementation of MOVE ParaTime on Oasis. I think this ParaTime would be the best in terms of privacy and security.I don't know if I'd go that far and call it the best, just that it's pretty cool that its ParaTime features allows another language to be added should there be a need for it.
